statements: SELECT * FROM escrow_accounts;
SELECT id, amount FROM escrow_accounts WHERE status='pending';
SELECT seller_id, buyer_id, amount FROM escrow_accounts WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, seller_id, buyer_id FROM escrow_accounts WHERE status='completed';
SELECT * FROM escrow_accounts WHERE seller_id = buyer_id;
SELECT * FROM escrow_accounts WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, buyer_id, status FROM escrow_accounts WHERE seller_id = 5 AND status = 'pending';
SELECT seller_id, buyer_id, amount FROM escrow_accounts WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT id, seller_id, buyer_id, amount, status FROM escrow_accounts WHERE seller_id = 10 OR buyer_id = 15;
SELECT id, status FROM escrow_accounts WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM escrow_account ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, account_holder_name FROM escrow_account WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_holder_name, balance FROM escrow_account WHERE balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, created_at FROM escrow_account WHERE account_holder_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM escrow_account WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, account_holder_name, balance FROM escrow_account WHERE balance < 5000 AND created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT account_holder_name, balance, MAX(created_at) AS latest_transaction FROM escrow_account GROUP BY account_holder_name HAVING balance > 2000 ORDER BY latest_transaction DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transaction WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT id, account_holder_name, balance, created_at FROM escrow_account WHERE account_holder_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY balance DESC, created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM EscrowAccounts;
SELECT id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM EscrowAccounts;
SELECT status, amount FROM EscrowAccounts WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM EscrowAccounts;
SELECT id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount, status FROM EscrowAccounts WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT id, created_at, username FROM Users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount, status FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Transactions GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id;
SELECT * FROM EscrowAccounts WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT id, account_holder, amount FROM EscrowAccounts WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT transaction_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount < 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'jo%';
SELECT * FROM EscrowAccounts WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_holder, amount FROM EscrowAccounts WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY account_holder ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, address FROM Users WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE status = 'completed' AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT eh.history_id, e.account_holder, t.amount, eh.history_date FROM EscrowHistory eh JOIN EscrowAccounts e ON eh.escrow_id = e.id JOIN Transactions t ON eh.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE eh.status = 'completed' ORDER BY eh.history_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(wallet_id) AS wallet_count FROM Wallets GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM EscrowAccounts ORDER BY amount DESC, created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM EscrowAccounts WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT account_holder, amount FROM EscrowAccounts WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT wallet_id, balance FROM Wallets WHERE user_id = 10 AND balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM EscrowLogs WHERE action = 'release' AND created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01';
